text: Tobruk is a 1967 American World War II drama movie. It was directed by Arthur Hiller. Actors included Rock Hudson, George Peppard, Nigel Green, Norman Rossington, and Guy Stockwall. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. Tobruk received an Academy Award nomination for Special Visual Effects in 1968. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1967 drama movies Category:1967 war movies Category:1960s American drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Arthur Hiller
title: Tobruk (1967 movie)
